data.name: Medical Virtual Reality | Medical VR | DICOM Viewer | Human Body VR | Human Anatomy | MEDICALHOLODECK
data.detailed_description:
Update January 2019

Free access to Medicalholodeck Cloud on all versions. Collaborate on medical data in groups.


About the Software

Medical Virtual Reality | Medical VR

Work and collaborate on 3D medical Data in real 3D Virtual Space: Medicalholodeck is the medical Platform for Virtual Reality (VR). Surgeons use it to prepare their upcoming surgeries, professors to teach human anatomy and radiology, students to study human anatomy, medical imaging and biovisualization Labs to work on 3-dimensional scientific data.

Attention: this app requires a strong Graphics Card (GPU). We recommend a GTX1080TI or better.

For Regular Updates, New DICOM files and News go to

https://www.medicalholodeck.com

Medicalholodeck is made for:

Human Anatomy Teaching

Teach Human Anatomy as never before: Use Medicalholodeck for better and more efficient teaching. Load your own medical DICOM files and teach your students human anatomy in the most immersive way possible - in real 3D. Connect groups of students in virtual space, guide them and let them collaborate and interact on 3D medical data.

Radiology Teaching

Teach radiology in real 3D instead of 2D screens: Use the software for your radiology teaching. Load your own DICOM files within seconds, visualize them in real 3D and teach your students radiology in the most intuitive and immersive way possible. Explain and discuss 2D and 3D DICOM images at the same time.

For Medical Students

Study human anatomy fast and immersive as never before: Study Radiology and Human Anatomy in 3D Virtual Reality/VR. Experience medical DICOM files in full 3D in virtual space. Get a much better understanding of human anatomy and radiology than ever before. Connect with other students in the Cloud and discuss, work and study together.

Radiologists & Surgeons

Surgery preparation in virtual space: Prepare upcoming surgeries in the most efficient and immersive way possible. Connect groups of users in Medicalholodeck, load DICOM data from your patients within seconds, and collaborate, work and discuss together medical cases in a real 3D virtual space.

Virtual Reality Anatomy Dissection Table

Dissect human anatomy DICOM files in Virtual Reality/VR: Dissect and study human medical anatomy data in real 3D space and in real-time. Study volumetric medical DICOM files in immersive real 3D instead of 2D-screens. Medicalholodeck is closer to reality, more immersive and cheaper than comparable solutions.

Free DICOM files for download:

https://www.medicalholodeck.com/medical_virtual_reality_downloads/medical_vr_downloads.html

User Manual here:

https://www.medicalholodeck.com/medical_virtual_reality_usermanual/medical_vr_usermanual.html

Medicalholodeck FAQ:

https://www.medicalholodeck.com/medical_virtual_reality_faq/medical_vr_faq.html

data.short_description: Medical Virtual Reality | Medical VR: Work and collaborate on 3D medical Data in real 3D Virtual Space. Medicalholodeck is the medical Platform for Virtual Reality (VR). Surgeons use it to prepare their upcoming surgeries, professors to teach human anatomy and radiology and students to study human anatomy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 8.1
  • Processor: i5 2.3 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX1080
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 8.1
  • Processor: i5 2.3 Ghz or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX1080, GTX1080 TI
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
